testcase.classname: To Publish A Story in NovusApplication
testcase.name: To Create a story
testcase.system-out: Given User Have To Login The Novus Application..............................passed When User Have To Navigate to The Author Tab................................passed And User Have To Create a New Story and Publish.............................passed Then To Take The ScreenShot.................................................passed

testcase.classname: To Validate the Login Functionality Of Novus Application
testcase.name: Validate Login Function With Valid and Invalid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Has To Launch IGM Application....................................passed When User Has To Click Client Login button..................................passed And User Has To Enter Valid "<Username>" and "<Password>"...................passed And User Has To Click The Signin button.....................................passed Then User Has To Verify Credential Page.....................................passed
